Articles.Content:
I have been playing this game for a half of year,and I got an account recently.I think the game is really cool!

(I'm also a beginner of English and maybe I did some mistakes...)
Hey there. Sounds like the game is working for you. Hope you enjoy it as much as the rest of us.

I have been playing this game for a half of year,and I got an account recently.I think the game is really cool!

(I'm also a beginner of English and maybe I did some mistakes...)

Heya

Don't worry about the language...games are often multicultural and most people won't hold that against you. In fact, the only "evil" non-English speaking gamers I ever came across were the Russians in EVE Online. They eat babies and call clubbing baby seals a "sport"...or so I've heard.
